definition: a pitch that is not in the strike zone, to form into a ball by winding or rolling
details:
noun
- a pitch that is not in the strike zone
= example: a pitch that is not in the strike zone
- the game of baseball
- round object that is hit or thrown or kicked in games
= example: round object that is hit or thrown or kicked in games
- a spherical object used as a plaything
= example: a spherical object used as a plaything
- a solid projectile that is shot by a musket
= example: a solid projectile that is shot by a musket
= synonyms: musket ball
- one of the two male reproductive glands that produce spermatozoa and secrete androgens
= example: one of the two male reproductive glands that produce spermatozoa and secrete androgens
= synonyms: egg, bollock, nut, testis, testicle, orchis, ballock
- a more or less rounded anatomical body or mass
= example: a more or less rounded anatomical body or mass
- a lavish dance requiring formal attire
= synonyms: formal
- a compact mass
= example: a compact mass
= synonyms: clump, clod, glob, lump, chunk
- the people assembled at a lavish formal dance
= example: the people assembled at a lavish formal dance
- an object with a spherical shape
= example: an object with a spherical shape
= synonyms: globe, orb
verb
- to form into a ball by winding or rolling
